text:
@GOP @WhiteHouse Kyle Griffin @kylegriffin1
Austin Mayor Steve Adler on CNN on infection numbers in his city: "If we don't change the trajectory, then I am within two weeks of having our hospitals overrun. And in our ICUs, I think we could be ten days away from that."

#TrumpTraitor 
#COVID19
